title: SESAME CHICKEN NOODLE BOWLS
directions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
Drain the pasta and add it to a large bowl.
Add the shredded chicken, red bell pepper, green onions, carrot and tablespoon of toasted sesame seeds to the pasta.
Add all of the sauce ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the sauce over the pasta mixture and toss together until everything is coated.
The pasta may be served warm or cold.
ingredients: 1 bag Explore Asian Organic Black Bean Pasta
1 pound cooked chicken breasts or rotisserie chicken, shredded
1/2 of a red bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 teaspoon chili paste such as Sambal Oelek
